item.title: Kim add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kim add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kim add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Kim add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Kim add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kim add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kim add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace." -- John Lennon

item.title: Kim add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Wrinkles should merely indicate where the smiles have been." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kim add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know what's weird? Day by day, nothing seems to change, but pretty soon...everything's different." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "How come we play war and not peace?" "Too few role models." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Who was the guy who first looked at a cow and said 'I think I’ll drink whatever comes out of these when I squeeze ’em?" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Kim add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "The French have a new president, the British will soon have a new P.M., and we envy them as we endure the endless wait for this small dim man to go back to Texas and resume his life." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Kim add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben
